description:
The scattered wreckage of the Water Strider that Qwenthur and Havia blew up some time ago is now a treasure trove of intel on the enemy. But with another party trying to horn in on the prize, they have been ordered to do something about it.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Junk no Haka wa Rare Metal no Yama: Alaska Senjougo Geigekisen I
Les débris sont des montagnes d`or. Contre-attaque pour les restes de la bataille d`Alaska, partie 1
The Graveyard of Junk Is a Mountain of Rare Metals: Interception at the Site of the Alaska Battle I
ジャンクの墓はレアメタルの山 アラスカ戦場跡迎撃戦 I
